page.title: 07Coll Magazine/Association
page.content: The Coll magazine was started by an authorist by the name of Pat Barr. Three years ago. It is an anual publication with a general theme for each magazine,eg the sea, the land. Contributiors for the magazine came from all sectors of the community, with advertesements from local businesses. Also people with connections to the island contribute. {Coll Association} Coll Association is based in Glasgow.It's members consist of ex-collachs , people who have viseted the island and a few collachs themselves. It conducts various activities throughout the year, mainly in Glasgow to raise funds for it's own use and for the benefit of Coll itself.
